评论详情: Fits well, boho blouse with ties at the neck, lovely flower pattern.
This is a very comfortable lightweight blouse. It is lightweight but not see-through. The fit is exactly as pictured and the sizing is as described.
Great top.  Fits true to size.
This shirt is so cute in person! The colors are bright. The elastic on the arms is a little tight, but not bad. The v-neck isn't too low. The shirt is comfortable and washed up well.

I gave it a 3⭐️ because I felt the quality didn’t match the price of 29.95 . Tho I purchased it on sale I felt that was more like it.  Not well made BUT I love the look! It’s vibrant and super chic trendy! Don’t really know what to do with the ties but over all I like how it fits . I’m in between  M & L so I went with Large. Glad I did cause there’s not any stretch but it fits loosely. I’ll wear it this summer and fall with shorts or jeans and a cardigan with it every now and again !  The winter months will brighten up those dreary days I’ll wear a cardigan as well. It’s so vibrant and cheerful! Overall it’s a thin satin kinda material with a thin lining so you can’t see through and it comes down over my butt so the length is good . I can tuck it or leave it hang . I love it though ! I’ll wear it often !

This is a nice “Boho” style floral printed blouse/shirt/top. It can be worn with dress pants or nice skirt for a dressier look, or with jeans, shorts, etc., for a more casual look. It washes and dries easily, especially if you don't mind a few small wrinkles. The style of this top does lend to the more casual side, so a few wrinkles look fine. The elastic at the wrists is nice to hold the sleeve in place, but not too tight. I wasn't sure what to do with the drawstrings, so I just tied them together in a knot about 6 inches from the end and they looked fine. I gave this a 4 star rating as the print does not go all the way through the fabric, so if the fabric flips over, you see the blank reverse side. Nice top for the price.

This blouse is thin and boxy.  It's rather cute but definitely disappointing.  It is not a flattering cut, and the thinness is a tad too cold and sheer. Seems true to size.  I would not reorder but I don't entirely dislike it.  It will be pleasant for a few wears.

This blouse is beautiful.  Very flattering.  Fits true to size and is super feminine.  Soft, lightweight, flowy fabric in a lovely floral pattern.  High quality fabric and tailoring.  Quick shipping and delivery.  Reasonable price.  I highly recommend.

评论概述: One Of My Favorite Blouses EVER!!!
评论详情: This is the most beautiful blouse. I love the fun and bright colors and the style. It is nice and thin, and super comfortable. The sleeves look really nice and flow well. The fit is as expected, and I would wear this blouse all year around. HIGHLY recommend!
Ordered this for the wife, This is a tubular shirt that has no curves, and is not true to size. Not loose or blousy. This top is costume quality.
This blouse is very pretty! The material is very flowy. So cute on! Large runs true to size. Love the color, light sunflower blue.

This top is a really cute style, fabric pattern, is lightweight and is perfect for warm weather. I’ve tried it on and it’s comfortable but not appropriate for this time of year. I do recommend this blouse for purchase.
This is a nice looking top on. It fits true to size. Perfect top for a spring day.

评论概述: Nice blouse, needs to be steamed
评论详情: This blouse is really pretty. Love the pattern. Fabric feels quality and has no stitching issues. Fabric has no stretch and is stiff, similar to a men's button up shirt. I washed and laid flat to dry, and the shirt was still wrinkled (see pics), so be prepared to steam it before wearing it out. Love this top, I know I'll get a lot of use out of it.
Great top with a trendy drawstring at the neck. It fits true to size and has a pretty design as well as detailing. Can be dressed up or down. Would recommend.
Super cute top, very girly. The fabric is...... different. Almost reminds me of cloth napkin at a restaurant. BUT, its not a deal breaker. I still think it looks great.

评论概述: Nice enough, not what I was expecting
评论详情: This top is okay, but from the picture I was expecting a nice soft, relaxed red and white print blouse. Instead, it is more of an orange-red than pictured, and the fabric feels stiff and cheap. I am hopeful it will soften with laundering. It does run small, so order one size up. Unfortunately I can’t recommend this item.
Beautiful blouse. Drapes well, fits true to size.

This is a very nice blouse. It is super cute and will go with dress pants or even dress up a pair of jeans.  It does fit true to the size suggested. I’m petite and the arms were just a little long for me but not even to look bad.  This came in a vacuum sealed package and the material is very nice.
Feels soft, runs big in regards to size. Washed well and did not need an iron.

This top is flattering and lightweight. It’s true-to-size and has great structure. I love the tiny details that are simple yet elegant, like the rouched neck and ruffle at the cuff. The blue pattern is very pretty and can go with nearly anything.

This blouse has a very nice look. It is comfortable to wear but the fabric has this cheap acetate-like feel to it. If you're sensitive to the way fabrics feel on your skin than I would skip this one. If that is not a concern for you, however, then it is definitely a cute look and versatile for dressing it up or down.

评论概述: Best thing about this is the photo.
评论详情: I didn't like this blouse from the moment I took it out of the bag.  This polyester fabric is satin-like, doesn't breath, and doesn't hang softly or well at all.  It feels awful on the skin and I couldn't get it off fast enough.  It also comes with heavy duty packaging wrinkles and nothing changed when machine washed in cold water and tumble dried for 10 minutes, then hung to finish drying.  It looks and feels no different afterwards.  The garment care tag says don't iron, so I guess you're supposed to wear it looking like it just came out of the squished package.  There are so many things is the description of this blouse that are not true or misleading at the best.  As an example, not one thing in the following sorta-sentence is true:  "Soft, lightweight, breathable fabric is allowing you to experience freedom of movement with utmost comfort"  Chiffon?  Not even close.  And I'd bet you that the fabric in the photo is not the same fabric - the photo looks chiffon like, making it a totally different blouse.  And the wide ranging descriptions are so laughable.  "Whether for business meetings or casual gatherings, this boho tops for women epitomizes your multifaceted charm."  Whatever charm I might have had before I opened the package has temporarily  left me.

评论概述: Color a bit different from the picture
评论详情: It's a decent shirt but I bought it because it looked red with some slight orange in it but it really is just a bright orange which isn't as nice as it appears.  It's also dressier than i thought.  I washed and dried and it came out wrinkle free so that's a bonus.  I wore it and it was mostly comfortable, it fit according to size, just a little too bright for me and that's my main issue with it.

评论概述: Cute top, but more orange than red
评论详情: I like this top. The fabric seemed rather stiff at first, but really softened up after the first wash.  There was no shrinkage in the wash and the fit is ok but there is no stretch in the fabric at all. The color is more orange than it appears in the photo, which I admit is not flattering on me (red is always a tough color for me, I don’t look good in anything yellow or with yellow undertones, as is the case with the red of this top). Still, it is a nice quality top.

This women’s Boho blouse isn’t overly comfortable and is made of what I would call canvas (I know that’s not what is listed) but there is no stretch what so ever.  I’m hoping it will soften up when washing.  The print is pretty but not quite what I was hoping and overall the price for this blouse is overpriced (in my opinion). Overall three stars from me.

The color of this shirt is very bright.  It appears in the picture to be made of chiffon, but is a a heavier polyester fabric.  The shirt is not see through.  It fit true to size.  Sleeves are long enough on me.  Nice ruffle sleeve detail.
